revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Galar Mine |image = [[File:Galar Mine.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Galar Mine. |tokens = 1,320,000 |location = Between Galar Route 3 and Galar Route 4 }}
<!--T:2--> '''Galar Mine''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 20,767,840 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Rolycoly.png|40px]] Rolycoly || [[File:Worker.png|40px]] Worker Keith || [[File:Roggenrola.png|40px]] Roggenrola |- | [[File:Timburr.png|40px]] Timburr || [[File:Worker (female).png|40px]] Worker Georgia || [[File:Timburr.png|40px]] Timburr, [[File:Timburr.png|40px]] Timburr, [[File:Timburr.png|40px]] Timburr |- | [[File:Roggenrola.png|40px]] Roggenrola || rowspan=2| [[File:Worker (female).png|40px]] Worker Sandra || rowspan=2| [[File:Diglett.png|40px]] Diglett, [[File:Drilbur.png|40px]] Drilbur |- | [[File:Woobat.png|40px]] Woobat |- | [[File:Diglett.png|40px]] Diglett || rowspan=2| [[File:Worker.png|40px]] Worker Russell || rowspan=2| [[File:Rolycoly.png|40px]] Rolycoly |- | [[File:Drilbur.png|40px]] Drilbur |}
